text: Izaac Farrell is a rugby league footballer who plays as a scrum-half for the Sheffield Eagles in the Betfred Championship. Izaac is a product of the Giants' academy system https://www.examinerlive.co.uk/sport/rugby- league/news/academy-product-izaac-farrell-signs-12945721 and is the son of former Huddersfield, Sheffield, and Leeds player Anthony Farrell and the brother of current Sheffield Eagles player Joel Farrell In 2017 he made his Challenge Cup début for the Huddersfield Giants against the Swinton Lions.Huddersfield Giants v Swinton Lions In 2018 he joined the Batley Bulldogs in the Betfred Championship on a season long loan. He made his Super League debut for the Giants in February 2019.http://www.rugbyleagueproject.org/matches/Custom/MzItMTg4NS0tNS0tLS0tMjM3MTgtLS0tLS0tLS0tLS0t ==References== ==External links== *Huddersfield Giants profile *SL profile Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Rugby league halfbacks Category:English rugby league players Category:Huddersfield Giants players
title: Izaac Farrell
